title: Mediterranean Village (Pueblo mediterraneo) from AGPA 73: Pan American Graphic Arts (AGPA 73: Artes gráficas panamericanas)
medium: Etching and aquatint with embossing from a portfolio of 11 screenprints (one with embossing), seven etchings (three with aquatint, one with embossing), six lithographs (one with etching), five linoleum cuts (one with embossing), one engraving, and one intaglio with embossing
credits: Gift of Cartón y Papel de México, S. A.
